channel.title: WSFC on IT Gaiden

item.title: WSFC – Validate Configuration wizard error
item.description: This is a short post talking about Windows Server Failover Clustering (WSFC)and a problem I found when adding the nodes from your cluster using the «Validate a Configuration»wizard.This wizard is recommended to run after configuring your nodes and before creating the cluster in order to spot any misconfigurations.So now, let’s go into the problem. The issue In the wizard when trying to add (in my example) the second node shows an error:Failed to access remote registry on .
